医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
纽约大学朗格健康中心连续第七次获得 Leapfrog 最高安全评级NYU Langone Health 连续第七次在整个系统的住院地点获得最高安全评级，每个住院地点在 2023 年秋季 Leapfrog 医院安全等级发布中均获得“A”评级，患者安全水平仅比其他医院高 30 分占全国医院的百分比。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/NYU-Langone-Health-earns-Leapfrogs-top-safety- ratings-for-the-seventh-time-in-a-row.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/NYU-Langone-Health-earns-Leapfrogs-top-safety- ratings-for-the-seventh-time-in-a-row.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8953e54f-2cf1-4293-9c62-c52d30a73699 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 12:20:02 -0500 NYU Langone Health earns Leapfrog's top safety ratings for the seventh time in a row
使医疗保健系统更具可持续性的实用技巧减少医院中的一氧化二氮废物，改用可重复使用的阴道窥器进行宫颈筛查，以及开药片而不是静脉注射药物，这些只是医生可以采取的减少医疗保健碳足迹的一些切实行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Practical-tips-for-making-healthcare-systems-more-sustainable.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Practical-tips-for-making-healthcare-systems-more-sustainable.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25379a6c-862d-44e2-8af5-13e978fed228 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 12:12:56 -0500 Practical tips for making healthcare systems more sustainable
科学家开发出组织粘合明胶水凝胶以加速伤口愈合、预防感染开放性伤口，无论是由事故还是手术等医疗程序引起的，都需要适当的处理以加速愈合并预防感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Scientists-develop-tissue-adhesive-gelatin-hydrogels-to-speed-up-wound-healing-prevent-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Scientists-develop-tissue-adhesive-gelatin-hydrogels-to-speed-up-wound-healing-prevent-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04c0a28c-cf76-4d14-b591-9877801dfc60 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 12:09:23 -0500 Scientists develop tissue adhesive gelatin hydrogels to speed up wound healing, prevent infections
研究显示英国假肢和矫形器劳动力严重短缺斯塔福德郡大学的一项研究显示，英国的假肢师、矫形师、假肢和矫形技术人员以及支持人员的数量严重不足。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Study-reveals-significant-deficit-in-the-UKs-prosthetic-and-orthotic-workforce.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Study-reveals-significant-deficit-in-the-UKs-prosthetic-and-orthotic-workforce.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=971d2f12-ae82-44fa-85ae-a67ce92defce Mon, 06 Nov 2023 12:03:27 -0500
慢性疲劳综合症患者受益于认知行为疗法阿姆斯特丹 UMC 和伦敦国王学院的研究人员表明，认知行为疗法 (CBT) 对 ME/CFS 患者有益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Patients-with-chronic-fatigue-syndrome-benefit-from-cognitive-behavior-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Patients-with-chronic-fatigue-syndrome-benefit-from-cognitive-behavior-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6a6c14d-7a45-4647-85b9-a57b44c0dd80 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 11:57:37 -0500 Patients with chronic fatigue syndrome benefit from cognitive behavior therapy
高生物学年龄与中风和痴呆风险增加有关生物学年龄高于实际年龄的人患中风和痴呆（尤其是血管性痴呆）的风险显着增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/High-biological-age-linked-to-increased-risk-of-中风-and-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/High-biological-age-linked-to-increased-risk-of-中风-and-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33ce4838-2d00-45c4-bd92-d5b0bb0832d4 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 11:52:09 -0500 High biological age linked to increased risk of stroke and dementia
美国农村的跨性别成年人更有可能患有心血管疾病危险因素根据即将在美国心脏协会年会上公布的一项初步研究，生活在美国阿巴拉契亚农村地区的跨性别成年人更有可能患有心血管疾病危险因素，如吸烟、肥胖和高血压，这要感谢他们的同性别同龄人。 2023 年科学会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Transgender-adults-in-rural-US-more-likely-to-have-cardiovian-disease-risk-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Transgender-adults-in-rural-US-more-likely-to-have-cardioangio-disease-risk-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e069c7df-d831-4c6e-9794-e7d2ba050ced Mon, 06 Nov 2023 11:38:09 -0500 Transgender adults in rural US more likely to have cardiovascular disease risk factors
两种与女性心血管疾病风险增加相关的生殖健康状况根据将于 2023 年美国心脏协会科学会议上发表的两项初步研究，女性常见的两种生殖健康状况——多囊卵巢综合征和痛经——均与心血管疾病风险增加相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Two-reproductive-health-conditions-linked-with-increasing-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Two-reproductive-health-conditions-linked-with-increasing-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=059eebbc-ab18-40bb-8f2a-4d32733248f1 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 11:29:06 -0500 Two reproductive health conditions associated with increasing cardiovascular disease risk in women
实验性无线起搏器从心脏收集能量为电池充电根据将于 2023 年美国心脏协会科学会议上发表的一项原理验证研究，通过将机械能转换为电能，实验性无线或无引线起搏器外壳能够对其电池进行部分充电。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Experimental-wireless-pacemaker-harvests-energy-from-heart-to-recharge-battery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Experimental-wireless-pacemaker-harvests-energy-from-heart-to-recharge-battery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed6c2c79-8109-42e4-8cdd-713c65d735b8 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 09:36:25 -0500 Experimental wireless pacemaker harvests energy from heart to recharge battery
人工智能可以彻底改变心源性猝死的预测和预防根据即将在美国心脏大会上发表的初步研究，通过人工智能 (AI) 可以预测心源性猝死，甚至解决一个人的风险以防止未来死亡，并且可以为预防和全球健康策略提供新的举措2023 年协会复苏科学研讨会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/AI-could-revolutionize-sudden-cardiac-death-prediction-and-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/AI-could-revolutionize-sudden-cardiac-death-prediction-and-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4da33fb0-d0f3-4324-95f1-4dc07a071401 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 09:28:27 -0500 AI could revolutionize sudden cardiac death prediction and prevention
